titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Department of Defense from purchasing any product manufactured or assembled by Toshiba America, Incorporated, Toshiba Corporation, or the Kongsberg Vappenfabrik Company of Norway or their subsidiaries.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Military Nuclear Systems.

bill.summary: 7/23/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Department of Defense from purchasing any product manufactured or assembled by Toshiba America, Incorporated, Toshiba Corporation, or the Kongsberg Vaapenfabrik Company of Norway, or their subsidiaries.
